info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 9:45PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Madison, southeastern Beaverhead and central Gallatin Counties through 1015 PM MDT... At 944 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 20 miles west of Crescent Lake, or 28 miles east of Virginia City, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bozeman, Sheridan, Virginia City, Ennis, Alder, Pony, Monida, Norris, Big Sky, Mcallister, Bozeman Hot Springs, Lakeview, Yellowstone Village, Gallatin Gateway, Laurin, Cameron, Four Corners, Jeffers, Raynolds Pass and Monida Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
